gist.headline: Another tool for the belt
gist.blurb: GENEXUS AI has been added to our Dev_Tools collection. A sturdy backend bridge connecting apps to the hive.
gist.summary: Added GENEXUS AI to the community apps directory under developer tools.
gist.impact: Expands the list of available developer resources and backend integrations in the ecosystem.
gist.visual_concept: A cozy workshop scene representing 'Dev Tools'. The Bee mascot is organizing a shelf, placing a new box or server unit labeled 'GENEXUS'. Warm, constructive atmosphere.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot in a warm garden shed workshop, placing a high-tech server unit labeled 'GENEXUS' on a wooden shelf. Soft lime green (#ecf874) glow from the server lights. Pastel gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Emotionally warm.
